TopicTitle: KerbNet: Change Icon of visited anomalies

Articles.Content:
Well as the title says.

Last week i went anomaly hunting on the mun and i visited several "?" twice cause i thought i spotted a new one.

If the marker on the KerbNet map would show an ! instead of ? for the ones you got the wolrd-record allready, that would be super helpfull.
Sounds like a good idea, even though I don't have much experience with anomaly hunting, I do agree that it should be a ! instead of ? if you already visited it!
